channel.title: video on Neural Hydrology
channel.description: Recent content in video on Neural Hydrology

item.title: Multi-Timescale LSTM for Rainfall–Runoff Forecasting
item.description: Oral presentation at the virtual EGU General Assembly 2021 on rainfall–runoff forecasting with Multi-Timescale LSTM.

item.title: Uncertainty estimation with LSTM based rainfall-runoff models
item.description: Oral presentation at the virtual EGU General Assembly 2021 on uncertainty prediction with LSTMs in the context of rainfall-runoff modeling.

item.title: Examining the uncertainty estimation properties of LSTM based rainfall-runoff models
item.description: Oral presentation at the virtual AGU Fall Meeting 2020 on uncertainty prediction with LSTMs in the context of rainfall-runoff modeling.

item.title: LSTM-Based Rainfall–Runoff Modeling at Arbitrary Time Scales
item.description: Oral presentation at the virtual AGU Fall Meeting 2020 on streamflow prediction at arbitraty timescales with a single LSTM-based model.

item.title: A Deep Learning Architecture for Conservative Dynamical Systems: Application to Rainfall-Runoff Modeling
item.description: Spotlight talk at the AI for Earth Sciences workshop of the NeurIPS 2020, presenting a first glimpse of a new LSTM-based model that conserves mass by design: the Mass-Conserving LSTM

item.title: A Machine Learner's Guide to Streamflow Prediction
item.description: Spotlight talk at the AI for Earth Sciences workshop of the NeurIPS 2020, presenting introduction of the world and terminology of hydrology/streamflow prediction for data scientists.

item.title: Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks for rainfall-runoff modeling
item.description: Video presentation in CUAHSI’s 2019 Spring Cyberseminar Series on Recent advances in big data machine learning in Hydrology.
